Room.Name: Open Sky
Room.ShortDescription: You are in open sky, north of Brownhaven. 65.n3.e0.s0.w0
Room.LongDescription: From time to time there have been reports of a floating city, which may or may not be true. As you scan the skies, you note there is seldom a long, clear patch of open air, but instead there are lots of clouds everywhere. If there is such a thing as a floating city, it could easily stay hidden.
